body_html:
On Mon, Nov 7, 2016 at 1:00 PM, icouckuy notifications@github.com wrote:

Ok thanks, I was confused because the documentation says otherwise.

Hi there! Sorry for the confusion and troubles!

We regard base class distribution as being somewhat like an abstract base
class which lists the properties a distribution might have. In the
latest release (and indeed for some time now) a call to an unsupported
function should trigger NotImplementedError or an exception indicating
something along the lines of "cannot be implemented."

It seems Eigen now implements the (regularized) incomplete beta, both for
cpu and gpu:
https://eigen.tuxfamily.org/dox-devel/group__CoeffwiseMathFunctions.html
https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/190/add-
ternaryfunctors-and-the-betainc/diff

Not sure if it is in stable Eigen yet, have to check.

I opened a bug to implement student's t cdf now that betainc is supported.
We should be able to get this in reasonably quickly.

—
You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
#5413 (comment),
or mute the thread
https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABFZtkY_5Q4Zlwnl8_-SeX4Gn__TXYg0ks5q75FqgaJpZM4KqQH4
.

We regard base class distribution as being somewhat like an abstract base

body:
On Mon, Nov 7, 2016 at 1:00 PM, icouckuy notifications@github.com wrote:

> Ok thanks, I was confused because the documentation says otherwise.

Hi there!  Sorry for the confusion and troubles!

We regard base class distribution as being somewhat like an abstract base
class which lists the properties a distribution _might_ have.  In the
latest release (and indeed for some time now) a call to an unsupported
function should trigger NotImplementedError or an exception indicating
something along the lines of "cannot be implemented."

> It seems Eigen now implements the (regularized) incomplete beta, both for
> cpu and gpu:
> https://eigen.tuxfamily.org/dox-devel/group__CoeffwiseMathFunctions.html
> https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/pull-requests/190/add-
> ternaryfunctors-and-the-betainc/diff
> 
> Not sure if it is in stable Eigen yet, have to check.
> 
> I opened a bug to implement student's t cdf now that betainc is supported.
> We should be able to get this in reasonably quickly.
> 
> —
> You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/5413#issuecomment-258960948,
> or mute the thread
> https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABFZtkY_5Q4Zlwnl8_-SeX4Gn__TXYg0ks5q75FqgaJpZM4KqQH4
> .
